SEARCH
Package warzone.state

Class OrderExecution

java.lang.Object
warzone.state.Phase
warzone.state.GamePlay
warzone.state.OrderExecution
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class OrderExecution extends GamePlay
ConcreteState of the State pattern. In this example, defines behavior for commands that are valid in this state, and for the others signifies that the command is invalid.
See Also:

    • setTournamentMaxTurns

      public void setTournamentMaxTurns(int p_maxTurns)
      Sets the maximum number of turns for each player in the tournament. If no player has won once this limit is reached, the game will end as a draw.
      Specified by:
